name: Be The Calm in the Storm

description.value:
You return to the center of it all; the basic concept of your parable. To embrace the chaos of life: to be at the center of it all, and to be the storm of your own.

While you have Zeal, you cannot be knocked @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Prone} or moved against your will. Your saving throws against such effects automatically succeed or attempts to do so against you fail. Similarly, when you attempt to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.SkZAQRkLLkmBQNB9]{Escape} an effect that is your level or lower and has you @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{Immobilized}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{Grabbed}, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.VcDeM8A5oI6VqhbM]{Restrained}, you automatically succeed in your attempt.
